QuestionTxt: Please tell me the extent to which you agree or disagree with the following statement: Regulating the Internet using rules designed to regulate a landline telephone monopoly will hinder the development of innovative new services and reduce investment in Internet infrastructure? Would you say you agree strongly, agree somewhat, disagree somewhat, or disagree strongly?
SubPopulation: Asked of those who are following the story very/somewhat closely (50%)
SurveyOrg: TIPP--Techno Metrica Institute of Policy and Politics
StudyNote: Interviews were conducted with respondents on landline telephones and cellular phones. The sample includes 35% landline and 65% cell phone respondents.
